attributes.action: take action to stop the abuse of our vulnerable, elderly population.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Abuse occurs when people mistreat or misuse other people, showing no concern for their integrity or worth as individuals, and in a manner that degrades their well being. A Goldfish can have more protection from cruelty than the elderly.Abusive behaviours are used to manipulate victims into submission or compliance with their will. We ask that legislation is passed to stop this from happening and protect the elderly.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
